name: reviews
intro:
Welcome to DigBury, where I teach you twerps how to think!



Rad, creative triumph? I DIG it!

Bad, milquetoast trash? I BURY it!

reviews.title: Oranssi Pazuzu: Värähtelijä
reviews.blurb: Psychadelic black metal that (d)evolves and swirls into a weirdly perfect frenzy

reviews.title: Magic: The Gathering
reviews.blurb: The best. Tap into your wizard brain, explore the full spectrum of creativity

reviews.title: Nier: Automata
reviews.sub: This game makes the player confront what it is 2B or not 2B.
reviews.blurb: This game makes the player confront what it is 2B or not 2B.

reviews.title: Midsommar
reviews.blurb: Men and women, young and old, this one is beautifully hard to bear.

reviews.title: The Irishman
reviews.blurb: Ostensibly exploring life and death, this lifeless film has little to say about either.
